attributes.action: pick on the criminals instead of the hardworking people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
instead of spending the best part of £25,000 per year per prisoner how about the good old chain gang i'm sure some of these inmates are skilled in some trade or another, why not let them ACTUALLY repay the country for their wrong doings  instead of making us the poor folk who seem to be paying through the teeth for everything,
 i'm disgusted how u can start to investigate people who sign on only a small minority of them are claiming false benefits, put these criminals to good use and save yourself and the COUNTRY for goodness sake

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
